issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I am unable to install the sdk titanium in titanium studio, I can not continue this screen. and because of that, I've tried to make the local installation per package, but had no result. the screen displays the phrase "Titanium SDK could not be found To download the latest, go to Help> Check for Updates Titanium." I can not continue.
fields.summary: titanium studio does not recognize the sdk titanium, and not install.
fields.environment: does recognize the sdk in windows 8 pro 64.

comments.body:
HI,

Please try to run "titanium sdk install" in terminal.

Regards,
Shuo

I did this run. But now he no longer recognizes the android sdk, even before already has recognized.
even though I have installed the sdk titanium, now he does not recognize any sdk installed ...
I'm using version 3.1.3, I doubt if instability.

I suggest you to re-install all titanium components, please fully follow the guide document: [http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Installation_and_Configuration]

If the problem still happen, please run "ti info" in terminal, provide the output. 

On the other hand, please try to use the latest SDK.
